forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain for the afternoon. High 17C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers early becoming a steady rain for the afternoon. High 64F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 13C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain this evening. Showers continuing overnight. Low 56F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 17C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 11C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 53F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers in the morning becoming a steady rain in the afternoon. High 17C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers in the morning becoming a steady rain in the afternoon. High 63F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 11C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 53F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High around 65F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early, then becoming foggy and damp late. Low 54F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two possible early with partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High 17C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A shower or two around the area in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 64F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.fcttext: A few showers early with mostly cloudy conditions late. Low 52F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 67F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies early will give way to low clouds and fog after midnight. Low 54F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.
